title: Villain Team Leader

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Evil faction roles aren't part of those factions and are Villains, even if you're dead or removed from the game. See #info-12 for how this works.
- This role can only spawn if there are two or more other evil factions in the game.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all who oppose the Villains.

desc:
Post 277
*And then we'll take over the world! Mwahahahaha!*
